39. $y=\cfrac{(x-1)(x-3)}{|x-2|+1}=\begin{cases} \cfrac{(x-1)(x-3)}{x-2+1},\ x\geqslant2,\\ \cfrac{(x-1)(x-3)}{2-x+1},\ x<2.\end{cases}=
\begin{cases} x-3,\ x\geqslant2,\\ 1-x,\ x<2.\end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task039-solution-fig1}
